Description:
Responsibilities:Lead the implementation of CAFM systems across multiple locations, ensuring alignment with organizational goals and objectives.
Develop detailed implementation plans for large-scale CAFM deployments.
Customize and configure CAFM software solutions to meet specific organizational needs.
Develop and deliver comprehensive training programs for end-users, providing guidance on CAFM system functionalities and best practices.
Provide ongoing technical support to end-users, troubleshoot system issues, and identifying opportunities for optimization.
Conduct regular system audits to maintain data integrity, identify system performance issues, and implement corrective measures.
Collaborate with external vendors and IT teams to coordinate system upgrades, patches, and enhancements, ensuring minimal disruption to operations.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree or equivalent education.
Minimum of 10 years of hands-on experience in implementing and managing CAFM systems, specifically in large-scale deployments across multiple locations.
Proven expertise in CAFM software platforms.
Knowledge of Facilio CAFM system is highly desirable.
